channel.title: cani on Cray System Management (CSM)
channel.description: Recent content in cani on Cray System Management (CSM)

item.title: Add A Blade To A Cabinet In SLS Using CANI
item.description: Add A Blade To A Cabinet In SLS Using CANI (ncn#|external#) Begin by initializing a session, which will import data from SLS and create metadata in SLS’ ExtraProperties field allowing the process to continue. cani alpha session init csm \ --csm-keycloak-username username \ --csm-keycloak-password password \ --csm-api-host api-gw-service-nmn.local # initialize a session by importing SLS data to cani Note: SLS data may be unstable if cani has never been run against it, in which case cani will not continue.

item.title: Add A Cabinet To SLS using CANI
item.description: Add A Cabinet To SLS using CANI (ncn#|external#) Begin by initializing a session, which will import data from SLS and create metadata in SLS’ ExtraProperties field allowing the process to continue. cani alpha session init csm \ --csm-keycloak-username username \ --csm-keycloak-password password \ --csm-api-host api-gw-service-nmn.local # initialize a session by importing SLS data to cani Note: SLS data may be unstable if cani has never been run against it, in which case cani will not continue.
